      • copyResources

        public static void copyResources(java.lang.String path,
                                 java.lang.String resourcePath,
                                 java.lang.Class referenceClass)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Copies resources from a folder in a jar file to a sub-directory on disk with the same name. If the target path does not exist it will be created.
        Parameters:
        path - Target base path
        resourcePath - JAR/target folder name of the resources
        referenceClass - Class in the jar file containing the resources
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Creation of directories or copying can throw an exception.

      • collectFiles

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> collectFiles(java.util.List<java.lang.String> input)
                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Recursively collect all files in a list of files and paths with sub-directories with absolute paths
        Parameters:
        input - List of file or directory names
        Returns:
        All absolute file names including all files in sub-directories
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a provided input element corresponds not to an existing directory or file
